title: crash while in champ select?
body: Randomly when I'm in a ranked champ select I crash?? and now I have to wait a really long time and I made a forum post like this before and no it's not my internet cause for sure so don't tell me it's my internet. So basically I dodged a game already and next select I crash so which meaning I have to wait 30 minutes and I lose 10 lp and I find that pretty bull shit because I know for a fact it's not my connection it's either your client is garbage or something else

replies.body: frustrating isnt it, i posted just now on same issue, now i have to wait to 5 x 20 min bans just because there game is buggy

Crashes during champion select are usually caused by third party programs that aren't interacting properly with League.  If you are using any like play.tv or overwolf, remove them for the fix.  If that doesn't fix your issue, let me know if you are getting any error messages or what you're seeing at that moment.  Let me know!
i dont even know what any of those are
